OrgName.entry: PARKS AND COUNTRYSIDE SERVICES - PARK PAVILIONS - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: The pavilions of the Parks and Countryside Service are available for hire for a wide variety of uses. There are 11 buildings of various sizes and scope in and around the city: Angram Bank Pavilion, S35; Centre in the Park, Norfolk Park, S2; Bolehill Pavilion, S10; Graves Park Pavilion, S8; Hillsborough Park Pavilion, S6; Hollinsend Pavilion, S12; Middlewood Park Pavilion, S6; Parson Cross Park Pavilion, S5; Stannington Pavilion, S6; The Pavilions, Sheffield Botanical Gardens, S10; The Alan Bailey Visitors Centre, S13.
